neutral.description: Primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

info.description: Accent background of the message with regular information.

success.description: Accent background of the message or banner with information about the successful result.

critical.description: Accent background of a message or a banner with a critical information.

warning.description: Accent background of a message or a banner with a warning information.

highlight.description: Accent background of the information you want to highlight.

advertising.description: Accent background for the advertising banners and controls.

muted.description: Accented muted background for a message with regular information.

invert.description: Inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

invert-hover.description: Hover state for the inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state for the inverted version of the primary background of the interface that contains the main data and information.

neutral.description: Secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the interface which contains the main data and information.

info.description: Secondary background of a message with regular information.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of a message with regular information.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of a message with regular information.

success.description: Secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

success-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

success-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with success information you want to accent.

critical.description: Secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

critical-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

critical-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

warning.description: Secondary background of the message with warning information you want to accent.

warning-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the message with warning information you want to accent.

warning-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the message with critical information you want to accent.

highlight.description: Secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

highlight-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

highlight-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background of the information you want to highlight.

advertising.description: Secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

advertising-hover.description: Hover state of the secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

advertising-active.description: Active (selected) state of the secondary background for the advertising message you want to accent.

success.description: Text associated with success states and data.

success-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the text associated with success states and data.

critical.description: Text associated with critical states and data.

critical-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the text associated with critical states and data.

primary-invert.description: Inverted version of the primary text.

secondary-invert.description: Inverted version of the secondary text.

link-hover-active.description: Hover and active states for the link text.

link-invert.description: Inverted version of the link text. Use on dark background only.

link-invert-hover.description: Hover and active states of the inverted version of the link text. Use on dark background only.

hint-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the hint link text.

hint-invert.description: Inverted version of the hint link text.

hint-invert-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the inverted version of the hint link text.

large-info-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the link text with font-size ≥20px.

large-success.description: Text with font-size ≥20px associated with success states and data.

large-success-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the text with font-size ≥20px associated with success states and data.

large-critical.description: Text with font-size ≥20px associated with critical states and data.

large-critical-hover-active.description: Hover and active states of the text with font-size ≥20px associated with critical states and data.

info.description: Subtle secondary border in the informational message.

info-active.description: Active border in focused input filed.

success.description: Subtle secondary border in the successful message and input field.

success-active.description: Active border in the focused input field with valid state.

critical.description: Subtle secondary border in the critical message and invalid input field.

critical-active.description: Active border in the focused input field with invalid state, and active state of the other components with invalid state.

critical-pattern.description: Used for the invalidStatePattern utils component to mark all kinds of inputs with invalid states.

warning.description: Subtle secondary border in the warning message.

warning-active.description: Active border in components with warning intention.

primary-invert.description: Inverted version of the neutral primary border. Use it for borders on the dark or color background.

secondary-invert.description: Inverted version of the neutral secondary border. Use it for borders on the dark or color background.

tooltip-invert.description: Border of the Tooltip with dark theme.

table-accent.description: Accent borders in the Table: for the accordion in the table and for the header of the secondary table.

date-picker-range-comparison.description: Border color of the second period for the comparison mode in the DatePicker.

switch-bg.description: Subtle background of the Switch control.

info.description: Background of the regular primary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the regular primary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular primary control.

success.description: Background of the primary control with successful theme.

success-hover.description: Hover state of the primary control with successful theme.

success-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary control with successful theme.

critical.description: Background of the primary control with danger theme.

critical-hover.description: Hover state of the primary control with danger theme.

critical-active.description: Active (selected) state of the primary control with danger theme.

brand.description: Background of the primary brand colored control.

brand-hover.description: Hover state of the primary brand colored control.

brand-active.description: Active state of the primary brand colored control.

advertising.description: Hover state of the advertising primary control.

advertising-hover.description: Active (selected) state of the advertising primary control.

advertising-active.description: Background of the advertising primary control.

invert.description: Inverted background of the primary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted primary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted primary control.

neutral.description: Background of the regular secondary control.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the regular secondary control.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular secondary control.

info.description: Background of the accent secondary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the accent secondary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the accent secondary control.

invert.description: Background of the inverted version of the secondary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted version of the secondary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted version of the secondary control.

neutral.description: Background of the regular tertiary control.

neutral-hover.description: Hover state of the regular tertiary control.

neutral-active.description: Active (selected) state of the regular tertiary control.

info.description: Background of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

info-hover.description: Hover state of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

info-active.description: Active (selected) state of the accent and link-lookalike tertiary control.

invert.description: Background of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

invert-hover.description: Hover state of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

invert-active.description: Active (selected) state of the inverted version of the tertiary control.

neutral-hover-active.description: Gray background color for the hover and active states of the primary neutral icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the gray-500 color.

info-hover-active.description: Blue background color for the hover and active states of the primary link-lookalike icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the blue-500 color.

success-hover-active.description: Green background color for the hover and active states of the primary success icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the green-500 color.

critical-hover-active.description: Red background color for the hover and active states of the primary critical icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the red-500 color.

warning-hover-active.description: Orange background color for the hover and active states of the primary warning icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the orange-500 color.

invert.description: Inverted version of the primary icon.

invert-hover-active.description: Hover and active (selected) states of the inverted version of the primary icon.

neutral-hover-active.description: Gray background color for the hover and active states of the secondary neutral icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the gray-300 color.

info-hover-active.description: Blue background color for the hover and active states of the secondary link-lookalike icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the blue-300 color.

success-hover-active.description: Green background color for the hover and active states of the secondary success icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the green-300 color.

critical-hover-active.description: Red background color for the hover and active states of the secondary critical icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the red-300 color.

warning-hover-active.description: Orange background color for the hover and active states of the secondary warning icon. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness(0.8), applied to the orange-300 color.

non-interactive.description: Color for the default non-interactive icon.

cell-current.description: Color for marking the cell with the current date, month or year in the date-picker.

cell-hover.description: Hover state of the default date-picker cell background.

cell-range.description: Background for the cell which is included in the date range in the date-picker.

cell-range-hover.description: Hover state of the background for the cell which is included in the date range in the date-picker.

cell-active-hover.description: Hover for the active (selected) date-picker cell background.

cell-current-invert.description: Color for marking the active cell with the current date, month or year in the date-picker.

cell-comparison-active.description: Active (selected) date-picker cell background for comparison periods.

cell-comparison-active-hover.description: Hover for the active (selected) date-picker cell background for comparison periods.

item.description: Default background color for the list item in the dropdown-menu.

item-hover.description: Hover state of the default background color for the list item in the dropdown-menu.

item-selected.description: Active (selected) state of the default background color for the list item in the dropdown-menu.

item-selected-hover.description: Hover state for the selected state of the default background color for the list item in the dropdown-menu.

dot-outer-border.description: Color of the outer border of the FeaturePopover.Spot.

bg-hover.description: Hover state of the background color of the ProgressBar.

bg-invert.description: Inverted version of the background color of the ProgressBar.

bg-invert-hover.description: Hover state for the inverted version of the background color of the ProgressBar.

value-gradient.description: Value with gradient for the ProgressBar.

pattern-gradient.description: Null value gradient for the ProgressBar.

value-bg.description: Base value background for the ProgressBar. It is used to create gradients for the values.

bg-invert.description: Inverted version of the default color for the Skeleton.

cell.description: Background of the header cell in the primary Table.

cell-hover.description: Background of the hovered header cell in the primary Table.

cell-active.description: Background of the active header cell in the primary Table.

cell.description: Background of the header cell in the secondary Table.

gradient.description: Background gradient for sorting icon that absolute positioned in the table head.

cell.description: Background of the default cell in the Table.

cell-hover.description: Background of the default hovered cell in the Table.

cell-active.description: Background of the default active cell in the Table.

cell-unread.description: Background of the unread cell in the Table.

cell-actions-accordion.description: Background of the cell used for Accordion or actions row, in the Table.

cell-selected.description: Background of the selected cell in the Table.

cell-selected-hover.description: Background of the hovered selected cell in the Table.

cell-selected-active.description: Background of the active selected cell in the Table.

cell-new.description: Background of the cell with new information in the Table.

cell-new-hover.description: Background of the hovered cell with new information in the Table.

cell-new-active.description: Background of the active cell with new information in the Table.

cell-critical.description: Background of the cell with critical information in the Table.

cell-critical-hover.description: Background of the hovered cell with critical information in the Table.

cell-critical-active.description: Background of the active cell with critical information in the Table.

cell-warning.description: Background of the cell with warning information in the Table.

cell-warning-hover.description: Background of the hovered cell with warning information in the Table.

cell-warning-active.description: Background of the active cell with warning information in the Table.

google-blue.description: Google brand color for the link.

google-green.description: Google green brand color for the link.

card-hover.description: Hover state for the shadow of the Card with hover state.

dnd.description: Shadow for show that element are being drag-and-drop.

modal.description: Default shadow if the Modal window.

popper.description: Default shadow of all Poppers, Dropdowns and Tooltips.

keyboard-focus-invalid.description: Keyboard focus styles for elements with invalid state.

keyboard-focus-valid.description: Keyboard focus styles for elements with valid state.

keyboard-focus-invert.description: Default keyboard focus styles for using with dark background.

fs-50.description: Use only for text in Badge component.

fs-100.description: Use with caution for text in additional messages. Always check its contrast and readability.

fs-200.description: Use for text in regular messages.

fs-300.description: Use for H6 with bold font-weight, and for text in regular messages.

subtitle.description: Use for big subtitles on the landing pages.

scale-indent.description: Base denominator of the design system.

addon-rounded.description: Use for rounding addons and small controls like Checkbox.

chart-rounded.description: Use for rounding big and small charts like bar, histogram and others.

control-rounded.description: Use for rounding all form controls: Button, FilterTrigger, Input, Textarea, Pills, etc.

progress-bar-rounded.description: Use for rounding bars: ProgressBar, SliderBar, etc.

surface-rounded.description: Use for rounding surfaces like Card, blocks, widgets, Notice, etc.

popper-rounded.description: Use for rounding all kinds of poppers and dropdowns.

modal-rounded.description: Use for rounding all kinds of big modal dialogs (e.g., Modal, Wizard).

disabled-opacity.description: Use for the disabled state of all kind of the controls and elements.

primary.description: Use for cover the content under the modal dialogs.

secondary.description: Use for the secondary modal dialogs that were opened upon the other modal dialogs.

limitation-primary.description: Use as a primary cover of the content under the messages about limitations.

limitation-secondary.description: Use as a secondary cover of the content under the messages about limitations.

invert.description: Inverted version of the default Tooltip background.

neutral.description: Neutral border of the components that are combined with neighbor-location property.

invert.description: Inverted border of the components that are combined with neighbor-location property.

shadow-left.description: Left-to-right fade shadow for the ScrollArea.

shadow-right.description: Right-to-left fade shadow for the ScrollArea.

shadow-top.description: Top-to-bottom fade shadow for the ScrollArea.

shadow-bottom.description: Bottom-to-top fade shadow for the ScrollArea.

dropdown-menu-left.description: Left-to-right fade shadow for the ScrollArea inside the DropdownMenu.

dropdown-menu-right.description: Right-to-left fade shadow for the ScrollArea inside the DropdownMenu.

dropdown-menu-bottom.description: Bottom-to-top fade shadow for the ScrollArea inside the DropdownMenu.

dropdown-menu-top.description: Top-to-bottom fade shadow for the ScrollArea inside the DropdownMenu.

gray-normal.description: Gray background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the gray-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

gray-hover-active.description: Gray background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the gray-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

blue-normal.description: Blue background color for primary tag. It’s built with CSS filter brightness(150%) that was applied to blue-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

blue-hover-active.description: Blue background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the blue-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

green-normal.description: Green background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the green-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

green-hover-active.description: Green background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the green-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

orange-normal.description: Orange background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the orange-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

orange-hover-active.description: Orange background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the orange-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

red-normal.description: Red background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the red-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

red-hover-active.description: Red background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the red-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

violet-normal.description: Violet background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the violet-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

violet-hover-active.description: Violet background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the violet-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

yellow-normal.description: Yellow background color for the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the yellow-500 color with 0.2 opacity on the white background underneath.

yellow-hover-active.description: Yellow background color for the hover and active states of the primary tag. It’s created using a CSS filter with a brightness of 150%, applied to the yellow-500 color with 0.3 opacity on the white background underneath.

white-hover-active.description: Hover and active (selected) state of the primary white tag.

gray-text.description: Gray text for the primary gray tag.

blue-text.description: Blue text for the primary blue tag.

green-text.description: Green text for the primary green tag.

orange-text.description: Orange text for the primary orange tag.

red-text.description: Red text for the primary red tag.

violet-text.description: Violet text for the primary violet tag.

yellow-text.description: Yellow text for the primary yellow tag.

white-text.description: White text for the primary white tag.

normal.description: Background color for the default secondary tag.

hover-active.description: Hover and active (selected) states of the background color for the default secondary tag.

white-hover-active.description: Active state of the secondary white tag.

gray-text.description: Gray text for the default secondary tag.

white-text.description: White text for the secondary white tag.

1.description: 1 color in the default list of colors for charts.

2.description: 2 color in the default list of colors for charts.

3.description: 3 color in the default list of colors for charts.

4.description: 4 color in the default list of colors for charts.

5.description: 5 color in the default list of colors for charts.

6.description: 6 color in the default list of colors for charts.

7.description: 7 color in the default list of colors for charts.

8.description: 8 color in the default list of colors for charts.

9.description: 9 color in the default list of colors for charts.

10.description: 10 color in the default list of colors for charts.

11.description: 11 color in the default list of colors for charts.

12.description: 12 color in the default list of colors for charts.

13.description: 13 color in the default list of colors for charts.

14.description: 14 color in the default list of colors for charts.

15.description: 15 color in the default list of colors for charts.

16.description: 16 color in the default list of colors for charts.

17.description: 17 color in the default list of colors for charts.

total-amount.description: Use it to show total value.

other-data.description: Use it to indicate voids, missing or some other data.

null.description: Use it to show null value.

x-axis.description: X-axis line on the chart grid.

y-accent-hover-line.description: Accent line for the hover state on the chart grid.

text-label.description: Text label on the chart grid.

bar-chart-hover.description: Background color for the hover state of a bar on the chart grid.

bar-chart-base-bg.description: Default background color of a bar in the BarChart.

period-bg.description: Use for highlighting the period on the chart grid.

border.description: Border for distinguishing data sets and chart dots on the chart grid.

period-active.description: Background color for the clickable date on the X-axis of the chart grid.

data-start-tracking.description: Background color for the "Start tracking" date on the X-axis of the chart grid.

extra-slow.description: Should be used for more complex effects and larger scale animations (such as page transitions or moving objects on and offscreen)

slow.description: Should be used for more larger scale animations (such as page transitions)

medium.description: Should be used for more complex effects (such as Modal)

fast.description: Should be used for more complex effects (such as Dropdown or Accordion)

extra-fast.description: Should be used for simpler effects and relatively small-sized animations (such as fades or color changes)

switch.description: Use for small controls like Switch or Slider.

popper.description: Use for components based on popper like Tooltip, Dropdown or Filter trigger.

control.description: Use for small controls like Checkbox or Radio.

modal.description: Use for Modal, Fullscreen Modal, Side panel or other kind of windows.

lift-me-up.description: Used for background of the Up button on the Intergalactic website.

lift-me-up-hover-active.description: Used for background of the Up button in hover and active states on the Intergalactic website.

top-menu.description: Used for main header of the Intergalactic website.

principles.description: Used for cards on the Intergalactic website.

tertiary.description: Used for branded links on the Intergalactic website.

neutral.description: Used for the background of the header and cards with links on the Intergalactic website.
